name: Timeblood
description:
A simple endlessrunner done as a final semester project.

Run through the forgotten graveyard and ... survive? Be the best at surviving! Yes!

  • Controls:
    • Space: Jump
    • Q (When rune circle is complete): Heal one and add 30 seconds to the timer.
    • Mouse0: Attack. If you attack a collectible, collect it and jump. This works in air as well.
  • Credits of any premade assets and code
    • Art:
      • - Ansimuz: https://ansimuz.itch.io/gothicvania-cemetery
      • - Saurabhkgp: https://saurabhkgp.itch.io/the-dawn-parallax-background
      • - Kenney: https://kenney.nl/assets/particle-pack
      • - Luke.RUSTLTD: https://opengameart.org/content/4-summoning-circles
    • Music/Soundeffects:
      • Ludum Dare loops https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle 
      • Shapeform Audio https://shapeforms.itch.io/shapeforms-audio-free-sfx
    • Code:

- Roman Numerals: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/7040289/converting-integers-to-roman-numerals
